array.string: export PROXY_PAC_DIRECTORY=/Library/WebServer/Documents; /bin/mkdir -p /usr/local/etc ; ( /bin/test -f $PROXY_PAC_DIRECTORY/proxy.pac.orig || /usr/bin/install -m 644 -S $PROXY_PAC_DIRECTORY/proxy.pac $PROXY_PAC_DIRECTORY/proxy.pac.orig ) && /bin/cp $PROXY_PAC_DIRECTORY/proxy.pac.orig /tmp/proxy.pac.orig && /usr/local/bin/wget -N -P /usr/local/etc http://securemecca.com/Downloads/AutoPac_EN.unx.7z && /usr/local/bin/7za x -aoa -o/tmp /usr/local/etc/AutoPac_EN.unx.7z AutoPac_EN.unx && /usr/local/bin/gpg --verify /tmp/AutoPac_EN.unx/proxy_en.sig /tmp/AutoPac_EN.unx/proxy_en && /usr/bin/printf '// *Modified for mydomainname.com*\n// King of the PAC from http://securemecca.com/pac.html:\n' > /tmp/proxy.pac && /usr/bin/sed -E 's/return[ \t]+normal/return MyFindProxyForURL(url.toString(), host)/g' /tmp/AutoPac_EN.unx/proxy_en >> /tmp/proxy.pac && /usr/bin/sed -E 's/function[ \t]+FindProxyForURL/function MyFindProxyForURL/' /tmp/proxy.pac.orig >> /tmp/proxy.pac && /usr/bin/install -m 644 -g admin -S /tmp/proxy.pac $PROXY_PAC_DIRECTORY/proxy.pac ; /bin/rm -fr /tmp/proxy.pac /tmp/proxy.pac.orig /tmp/AutoPac_EN.unx

dict.string: securemecca.com King of the PAC Modification
